html:
10.6.20  10:08 am   How do you make random videos that are good?

      that's probably impossible

10.6.20  10:05 am   What do I do when I don't want to do the thing that needs to be done?

      explain and analyze why you think it needs to be done. if you've done that sufficiently, the next thing you might be able to do is analyze HOW it can be done, very specifically. If you've figured that out and it's still not getting done after 7 Endless Eons, then it might be time to consider entering panic mode, or la mode de panique

10.6.20  10:05 am   how do i stop being bad at music

      how did you start

10.6.20  9:39 am   will you ever run out of ideas?

      yes but then i get more

10.6.20  9:38 am   Writing process?

      EXCITING PROCESS

10.6.20  9:25 am   How random is being  random ?

      random

10.6.20  9:22 am   Do you feel any pressure to create things?

     yes

     If so, does that pressure come from within yourself

     yes

     or from the part of the universe that is not you?

      i get a lot of external pressure for it, but that's not nearly as much as how much pressure i get from myself

10.6.20  9:13 am   Anything you want to say about sporks?

      yes but i don't think there is enough time

      i have no earthly idea

      remind me again which being is which height

      to distract you from the new building they are now building

      seems outlandish but it just might work

      take some pictures of them, framed in a way that makes them look like melons

      either another song/video or a fictional non-song video

     sure

10.6.20  1:23 am   why do you like tuesday,

     so fresh

     why not wednesday or thursday maybe? just wondering. 

     good also, but less fresh

10.6.20  1:00 am   give me y2k give me it i need it bill i must have it bill

      what happened was, in the late 1900s, as the year 2000 approached, people started realizing that most of the computer systems in the world were actually only using 2 digits for the date. so "75" is assumed to mean 1975. this wasn't a problem when those systems were designed, because probably no one expected them to be still in use by the end of the century. but they were. So the fear was that some terribly unexpected stuff may happen around the world as a result of all the computer systems suddenly thinking it's 1900, instead of 2000. there was a widespread fear that everything would break down. but luckily, through hard work i think, most of the important systems managed to get fixed in time, so there really wasn't any huge catastrophe. This issue was known as the "Y2K" issue, but besides that, Y2K was actually just a nickname for the year 2000. so essentially, Y2K means the year 2000. hope that helps

10.6.20  12:46 am   What temp does warm become hot?

      about 25

      upwards of 0, unless i am feeling totally reckless and irresponsible, which at this point i might be

      yes

     i was wondering if you could have both, by putting one on each side of the same coin

10.5.20  8:03 pm   i wanna talk to a psychiatrist but i need to meet face to face cuz i dont want my parents to hear me.... what should i do until i can see one?

      write things down

10.5.20  8:01 pm   how final cut X

      i'm gonna need a team of archaeologists to explain to me why they won't allow me to put the timeline vertically like this. especially in a world where VERTICAL video is actually a thing (and, most of that vertical video, actually probably has an extremely short horizontal timeline!). do you see how much space is wasted doing it the horizontal way

10.5.20  7:33 pm   10.4.20  3:15 am blocking as in theatre?

      basically what i'm doing is building the scenes WITHOUT making any decisions about the lights or cameras. this is because those 3 things (i suppose you could call them 'lights', 'camera', and 'action'), are each individually capable of such great expression that i've assumed for now that it would be most constructive to focus on each one separately so my brain doesn't explode any more than it already has

10.5.20  7:16 pm   when will there be a new song?

      right away

      perfect for learning to count

10.5.20  6:13 pm   if you go to sleep at 1.Am are you going to be early or late

      late is 'comparative'. what i mean by that, is for anything to be 'late' you need another point of reference to compare it to

      george bush
